mapper.insert: insert into `blog` (title, author_id, comment_size, create_time, read_size, vote_size, content, weight, blog_type) values (#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{author.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{commentSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{readSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{voteSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{weight,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{blogType})
mapper.update: update `blog` set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comment_size = #{commentSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, read_size = #{readSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, vote_size = #{voteSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, weight = #{weight,jdbcType=TINYINT}, blog_type = #{blogType} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select b.id as bid, b.title, b.author_id, b.comment_size, b.create_time, b.read_size, b.vote_size, b.content, b.weight, b.blog_type, u.id, u.truename, u.avatar, u.grade, u.introduce, u.username from `user` u inner join `blog` b on u.id = b.author_id where b.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select b.id as bid, b.title, b.author_id, b.comment_size, b.create_time, b.read_size, b.vote_size, b.weight, b.blog_type, u.id, u.truename, u.avatar, u.grade, u.introduce, u.username from `user` u inner join `blog` b on u.id = b.author_id order by b.weight desc, b.create_time desc
